DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial evaluate impact present medicare fee data inpatient laboratory test electronic health record provider order behavior tertiary care hospital .
DOC.brief_title: The Impact Charge Displays Inpatient Laboratory Test Ordering
DOC.detailed_description: This study clinical trial determine impact inpatient laboratory test order present provider medicare fee data time order entry . We randomly assign 60 laboratory test active arm ( medicare fee data display ) control arm ( medicare fee data display ) . The primary outcome change ratio test order per patient day 12 month study group ( intervention vs. control ) .
